title: DSC resource instance
description: Defines an instance of a DSC resource in a configuration.

dependsOn.title: Instance depends on
dependsOn.description: Defines a list of DSC resource instances that DSC must successfully process before processing this instance. Each value for this property must be the `resourceID()` lookup for another instance in the configuration. Multiple instances can depend on the same instance, but every dependency for an instance must be unique in that instance's `dependsOn` property.

properties.title: Managed instance properties
properties.description: Defines the properties of the DSC resource this instance manages. This property's value must be an object. DSC validates the property's value against the DSC resource's schema.
